featured.text: This was a slow process, requiring much skill and patience, and every page of every book had to be cut separately.

Then we were each separately sent on what was grandly referred to as a cruise in my father’s 18-foot boat, spending the night on board, and loaded down, according to my mother, with enough food for a week.

definition.en_def: In a way that is separate or apart from others.
definition.example: The two friends decided to travel separately to the festival.
